name: Roasted Vegetables

ingredients.name: eggplant
ingredients.additionalInstruction: cut in half, then cut into 1/2" slices

preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing bowl and toss to coat.
Place in a single layer on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner. Roast for 20 minutes, or until peppers are slightly charred.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!

products.name: Vegetable Seasoning
summary: All-in-one herby meal helper. Less measuring & more flavor!
